SELECT s.name AS snackName, h.time, h.count FROM history h JOIN snack s ON(h.snack_id = s.snack_id) WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT s.NAME as snackName, COUNT(member_id) AS count FROM vote v JOIN snack s ON (v.SNACK_ID = s.SNACK_ID) GROUP BY s.NAME

SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY h.count DESC) as rank, h.member_id, m.name, h.count FROM ( SELECT member_id, sum(count) AS count FROM history GROUP BY member_id ) h JOIN ( MEMBER m ) ON m.MEMBER_ID = h.MEMBER_ID

SELECT rank, snackId, name, count, imgUrl FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY count DESC) as rank, s.SNACK_ID as snackId, s.name as name, t.count as count, s.img_url as imgUrl FROM (( SELECT snack_id, sum(count) AS count FROM history GROUP BY snack_id) t JOIN snack s ON (t.snack_id=s.snack_id))) WHERE rank BETWEEN 1 AND 11
